long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser plugin that takes customizable screenshots in quick succession without interrupting your browsing experience. The pictures will be temporarily stored. When you need them, you can choose to download the pictures you want.

Features:

1. Use Ctrl+Q to combine shortcut keys to invoke the screenshot function, or right-click to select the screenshot option to take a screenshot.
2. During the screenshot process, click ESC to cancel the screenshot.
3. After the screenshot is completed, the image will be temporarily saved immediately, and there will be no interactive messages that will disturb your web browsing, so you can take screenshots quickly and continuously.
4. You can click the plug-in icon to browse, download, and delete your pictures in the plug-in page list.
5. The downloaded pictures will be automatically deleted from the temporary storage.

一款能够快速连续截图的浏览器插件，不会中断你的浏览体验。图片会一直暂存，当你需要的时候，可以选择下载你想要的图片。

特点:

1. 使用Ctrl+q就能组合快捷键唤起截图功能，也可以使用右键选择截图选项进行截图。
2. 截图过程中，点击ESC，就可以取消截图。
3. 截图完毕后，图片就会马上暂存，不会有任何交互消息打扰到你的网页浏览，因此你可以快速的连续截图。
4. 你可以点击插件图标，在插件页面列表中浏览，下载和删除你的图片。
5. 被下载了的图片会自动从暂存中删除。
